entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle or flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
